title: Rihanna to Headline the Super Bowl Halftime Show; The pop star will take the stage on Feb. 12, 2023, in Glendale, Ariz., for the NFL's annual championship game
text:
Rihanna teased her upcoming performance on social media Sunday, posting a picture of a woman's hand holding a football aloft on her Instagram account.

The NFL announced Friday that Apple Music as its new sponsor for the popular halftime show. Apple Music replaced PepsiCo Inc. after Apple Inc.'s streaming service signed a multiyear deal with the league.

More to follow

Write to Ginger Adams Otis at Ginger.AdamsOtis@wsj.com

Rihanna to Headline the Super Bowl Halftime Show
